person.name: Tridev Methuku
person.tagline: Research Engineer • ML/CV • RAG & Agents • MLOps

bullets: Developed lane-level analytics from graph-structured and image-based geospatial data for last-meter navigation.
Prototyped GenAI guidance for micro-addressing and lane transitions; improved route prediction accuracy by 12%.
Orchestrated multi-LLM (routing/ensembles) and multimodal (vision + lane-graph + text) models with retrieval grounding.
Deployed cloud prototypes on AWS with Docker; CI/CD and monitoring for >10K daily queries.
Led a team of 5 to optimize SPECT geometry with ML/DL, improving spatial resolution by 18%.
Automated imaging pipelines with SQL, Pandas, Airflow (throughput -30%).
Accelerated Monte Carlo reconstruction by 20% using simulation-informed modeling (GATE/ROOT).
Built AI agents (LangChain + MCP) on a RAG backend; ingestion via Airflow to S3/Postgres, parsing with unstructured/pdfminer.

Designed and deployed RAG: FAISS→Pinecone, hybrid dense+BM25 retrieval (E5-large/text-embedding-3-large), re-ranking (BGE/Cross-Encoder), metadata filters, Redis caching, FastAPI, MLflow evals (hit@k, MRR).
Translated research into deployable tools with clinicians; secured $800K funding.
Trained SSD-MobileNet to detect HDR ghost artifacts; 93% detection accuracy.
Built a large HDR ghosting dataset with labeling guides and QA checks.
Applied quantization and pruning; +25% inference speed, -40% model size.
Shipped in production camera imaging; active on millions of Samsung phones.
Designed a real-time computer vision system for automated parking; 96.8% detection accuracy at 100K images/day.
Built and deployed a GAN+RNN/LSTM pedestrian traffic model with DEEP SORT; +15% accuracy via optimized preprocessing.
Presented to stakeholders showing energy-cost reduction via pedestrian-based power optimization.

education.school: State University of New York at Buffalo

projects.title: GAN-based Synthetic MRI Generation
bullets: End-to-end GAN pipeline with U-Net/CNN priors; FID = 15.2, expanding MRI diversity.
Deployed on SageMaker with Docker; tracked experiments in MLflow.

projects.title: Transformer-based Text Classification (NLP)
bullets: Fine-tuned BERT on IMDb sentiment dataset; 94.2% accuracy.
Robust training/eval pipeline with reproducible seeds and stratified splits.

projects.title: LLM Agents & Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
bullets: Engineered AI agents with MCP tool orchestration.
Hybrid retrieval (dense+BM25) and cross-encoder re-ranking; -22% latency, +15% accuracy.
LoRA fine-tuning for efficient domain adaptation.

publications.title: Spatial-resolution metrics for self-collimation SPECT using DL for projection modeling
BCS^2: fast, adaptive 2-parameter clustering for telemetry/fleet analytics
